actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make available stocks of corn of the Commodity Credit Corporation to poultry and egg producers in the United States in order to encourage the development of export markets for poultry.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to make Commodity Credit Corporation corn stocks available to U.S. poultry and egg producers in order to encourage poultry exports.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make available stocks of corn of the Commodity Credit Corporation to poultry and egg producers in the United States in order to encourage the development of export markets for poultry.
